name: PHVS_TNMEditionNumber_NAACCR
title: NAACCR TNM Edition Number
description: Code that indicates the edition of the AJCC manual used to stage the case.

concept.display: Fifth Edition (published 1997), recommended for use for cases diagnosed 1998-2002
Fourth Edition (published 1992), recommended for use for cases diagnosed 1993-1997
Not applicable (cases that do not have an AJCC staging scheme)
Not staged (cases that have AJCC staging scheme and staging was not done)
Seventh Edition (published 2009), recommended for use with cases diagnosed 2010+
Sixth Edition (published 2002), recommended for use for cases diagnosed 2003-2009
